summary: Motivated retail sales professional with 6 years of progressive experience in high-volume environments. Proven track record in closing sales, building customer relationships, and delivering exceptional service. Skilled in inventory management, merchandising, upselling, and reporting; adept at using POS systems and Excel to drive revenue and improve operations.

experience.title: Sales Consultant
experience.description: Left for a better opportunity at Zimmer Brothers. Identified prospects' needs and developed appropriate responses along with information on products and services that would be suitable.

experience.title: Sales Consultant
experience.description: I worked hard in this high end jewelry store. Described products, explained care and details of merchandise; recommended and located in-demand items; performed cashier duties and provided excellent customer service. Generated sales and inventory reports in Excel with data from various sources; followed up on shipping and special orders; engaged with vendors on back orders.

experience.title: Floral Helper
experience.description: Assisted in flower shop operations, floral sales, POS usage, and basic floral design; handled weddings and funeral pieces; worked with a wide variety of flowers, greens, and stems.

experience.title: Sales Associate
experience.description: Worked with jewelry lines including Simon G, Alawand Vahan, Cheri Dori, Dia Dori, Pandora, Charles Garnier and Charles Krypell. Performed insurance and fair market appraisals; managed weights, stone identifications, color and clarity; maintained constant contact lists; introduced new jewelry lines; performed case displays, advertising, inventory, and repairs; assisted with customer requests and repairs; tracked shipments and inventory.

experience.title: Sales Associate
experience.description: Prepared merchandise for sales floor; directed merchandise placement; suggested accessories and complementary purchases; processed returns; negotiated and finalized sales contracts; mentored new associates; maintained merchandising standards; supervised shipment processing and inventory; answered customer inquiries and maintained a positive customer-focused environment.
